## Quarto slide

```{r}
#| fig.cap: "Legenda da figura"

ggplot(mtcars) +
    geom_histogram(aes(mpg),
                  fill = "blue", bins = 7) +
    theme_excel_new()
```

## Quarto slide

```{r}
#| echo: false

summarise(
    mtcars,
    media = mean(mpg), dp = sd(mpg), mediana = median(mpg),
    q1 = quantile(mpg, probs = 0.25),
    q3 = quantile(mpg, probs = 0.75)
) |>
gt()|>
    tab_header(title = "Medidas de resumo.") |>
    tab_source_note(source_note = md("**Fonte**: Elaboração própria.")) |>
    fmt_number(everything(), decimals = 2, sep_mark = ".", dec_mark = ",")
```
